TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {73368=Ridgeback has been manufacturing bikes for UK riders since 1983, quickly attaining an unmatched reputation for innovation and quality. Nearly 3 decades ago, Ridgeback launched the UK’s first mountain bike, and even today continues to look at everything cycling to make sure each new range meets the varied needs of today’s cyclists. From high performance flat bar and touring bikes to comfortable commuters and children’s bikes, Ridgeback leads the way. There’s never been a better time to be cycling, so whatever your riding style, we’re sure you’ll find a Ridgeback that’s right for you.}
